name: Adapter
description: This interface describes all the DOM dependent calls that Pixi makes throughout its codebase. Implementations of this interface can be used to make sure Pixi will work in any environment, such as browser, Web Workers, and Node.js.

properties.name: createCanvas
properties.description: Returns a canvas object that can be used to create a webgl context.

properties.name: createImage
properties.description: Returns an IImage (HTMLImageElement) that can be used to create a texture.

properties.name: getNavigator
properties.description: Returns a partial implementation of the browsers window.navigator

properties.name: getBaseUrl
properties.description: Returns the current base URL For browser environments this is either the document.baseURI or window.location.href

properties.name: getFontFaceSet
properties.description: Return the font face set if available

properties.name: fetch
properties.description: Returns a Response object that has been fetched from the given URL.

properties.name: parseXML
properties.description: Returns Document object that has been parsed from the given XML string.

properties.name: methods
properties.type:
`get():Adapter` and `set(adapter: Adapter)`.
 *
 * Defaults to the {@link BrowserAdapter}.
 * @example
 * import { DOMAdapter, WebWorkerAdapter } from 'pixi.js'
